metadata.title: The Children's Place Toddler Girls Cotton Pull on Shorts
features: FASHION SHORTS — Cute and comfy for all day play.
CLOSURE — Pull-on elasticized waistband with non-functional bow
DESIGN — Features front side slant pockets and allover daisy print
THE CHILDREN'S PLACE — We offer a huge selection of kid's clothing! Shop us for jeans, shorts, leggings, chinos, polo shirts, dresses, pajamas, and accessories.
description: The Children’s Place offers a huge selection of kid's clothing! Shop us for jeans, shorts, leggings, chinos, polo shirts, dresses, uniforms, pajamas, and accessories. Made with premium quality materials at a great value. Kids clothing made simple.
